title: Hempz Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer with Oatmeal, Shea Butter for Women and Men,2.25 oz. -Premium,Soothing Body Lotion with Hemp/ Cocoa /Mango Seed for Dry Skin -Skin Care Products
features: TRAVEL SIZE SOOTHING MOISTURIZER: Restore essential moisture to dehydrated skin with the Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer by Hempz! Our everyday body lotion features a natural Oat Complex, which will calm and soothe skin to leave it soft and smooth.

ENRICHED BODY CREAM: This daily herbal moisturizer features our signature blend of 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, an ingredient rich in Essential Fatty Acids that provide protein, carbohydrates, nutrients, key minerals and fiber for healthy skin.

NUTRIENT-RICH FORMULA: Our everyday body moisturizer is formulated with Shea Butter, Cocoa Seed Butter, and Mango Seed Butter to soothe, deeply hydrate, and smooth skin. It also has Chamomile and Avocado to fight irritation and replenish skin.

IDEAL FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Thoughtfully designed to be calming, rich and hydrating, this moisturizer cream will help reduce dryness and soothe sensitive or dehydrated skin. It contains no perfume and no dyes so that it is perfect for men and women.

SAFE SKINCARE: At Hempz, we believe in providing natural products that help you achieve your best, healthiest skin. Our herbal body lotion contains no parabens, gluten. It is 100% vegan, so you can be certain you are using safe products.
description: Hydrate and condition your skin with this Sensitive Skin Herbal Body Moisturizer by Hempz! Our exclusive body lotion has been enriched with 100% natural, pure Hemp Seed Oil, one of the best sources of Essential Fatty Acids that provide skin with protein, carbohydrates, nutrients, key minerals, and fiber. Additionally, it features a calming Oatmeal Complex that helps reduce dryness, prevents rough, scaly, or itchy skin, and helps skin feel soft and smooth. Your skin will be gently rejuvenated with this fragrance-free formula so that it is healthy, silky, and naturally beautiful. This daily herbal moisturizer is carefully formulated to provide moisture and nourishment to your entire body. It is blended with rich Shea Butter to help soothe and calm skin, nutrient-rich Cocoa Seed Butter to help deeply moisturize and nourish sensitive skin, and Mango Seed Butter that softens and smooth skins. Plus, this everyday body lotion contains Chamomile Extract, which treats irritants, and Avocado Extract that will improve your skin tone over time when used regularly. Our body moisturizer is designed for all skin types, and its natural extracts and oils help restore essential moisture to dehydrated and sensitive skin with a non-irritating, gentle formula. At Hempz, we believe in providing you with safe skin care products, which is why our body lotion is paraben-free, gluten-free, THC-free, perfume-free, dye-free, and 100% vegan. This hemp extract lotion is perfect for both men and women and helps enhance skinâ€™s moisture barrier - restoring your true, beautiful skin.
